data.title: List of American films of 2024
data.text:
This is a list of American films that are scheduled to release in 2024.

The highest-grossing American films released in 2024, by domestic box office gross revenue, are as follows:[1][2]

† Indicates films playing in theaters in the week commencing 19 July 2024.

Highest-grossing films of 2024 Rank Title Distributor Domestic gross 1 Inside Out 2 † Disney $596,404,306 2 Dune: Part Two Warner Bros. $282,144,358 3 Despicable Me 4 † Universal $260,097,160 4 Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire Warner Bros. $196,350,016 5 Kung Fu Panda 4 Universal $193,590,620 6 Bad Boys: Ride or Die † Sony $189,331,000 7 Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes † Disney / 20th Century $170,690,859 8 A Quiet Place: Day One † Paramount $127,868,769 9 Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire Sony $113,360,583 10 IF † Paramount $111,149,917
